data.title: SIDEARM Integrations
data.meta_description: Ross James (92) Punter - As A Junior (2023) Appeared in all 14 games for the Ducks, putting together one of the most efficient seasons ever by an Oregon punt...
data.text:
As A Junior (2023)

Appeared in all 14 games for the Ducks, putting together one of the most efficient seasons ever by an Oregon punter … Set the single-season program record with an average of 48.41 yards per punt, totaling 1,306 yards on 27 attempts … Boomed 10 punts of 50-plus yards and two of 60-plus yards, a 63-yarder at Texas Tech (Sept. 9) and a season-long 64-yarder at home against California (Nov. 4) … Pinned opponents inside the 20-yard line 11 times, including twice each against California (Nov. 4), Oregon State (Nov. 24) and in the Pac-12 Championship Game against Washington (Dec. 1) … Recorded just one touchback on the season … Punted a season-high five times for 250 yards, averaging 50.0 yards per punt, in win at Utah (Oct. 28) … Also averaged 50.0 yards per punt in the Pac-12 Championship Game vs. Washington (Dec. 1), punting four times for 200 yards.

As A Sophomore (2022)

Appeared in three games in first season for the Ducks … Punted eight times for 335 yards, averaging 41.88 yards per attempt … Long punt of 52 yards with three punts pinned inside the 20-yard line.

As A Freshman At East Central CC (2021)

Played nine games for East Central Community College in Dacatur, Miss. … Punted 62 times for 2,514 yards, averaging 40.5 yards per attempt … Pinned 21 punts inside the 20-yard line … Long punt of 63 yards in a win at Southwest while averaging a season-high 49.4 yards per attempt on nine punts.

High School

A first-team all-state selection as a senior for Hartfield Academy … Averaged 46.0 yards per punt with a long punt of 74 yards … A first-team all-MAIS selection as a junior after earning second-team honors as a sophomore … Coached by Craig Bowman.

Personal

Parents are Cliff and Susan James … Major is business administration.
